clinical_history: Patient presents with abdominal discomfort and bloating.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Soft tissue region demonstrates isoechoic without fluid collection.
Testes are hypoechoic with normal vascularity.
Liver appears smooth-walled with no focal lesions.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Right kidney demonstrates hyperechoic, no hydronephrosis.
Uterus appears isoechoic; endometrial thickness measures 2.04 mm.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 32.4 bpm.
